## Summary / Description

Provide a concise description of the change and its purpose.  
Include relevant context and motivation.

**Type of change** (mark with `x`):

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change)
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] CI/CD / Tooling change

---

## Related Issues

Link related issues or feature requests:

- Closes / Resolves / Fixes: #<issue_number>
- Related: #<issue_number>

---

## Motivation & Implementation

Explain why this change is needed and how it addresses the problem.  
Include:

- Implementation details
- Key decisions or trade-offs
- Dependencies on other modules or PRs

---

## Checklist (âœ… REQUIRED)

Mark each task when completed. **PR cannot be merged until all are checked**:

- [ ] Code follows repository style and conventions
- [ ] Tests added / updated to cover changes
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed
- [ ] CI passes on all relevant platforms
- [ ] Changes linked to at least one issue
- [ ] Reviewer(s) assigned for code review
- [ ] PR title follows semantic pattern: `[Type]: Short description`

---

## Additional Notes / References

Provide any extra information, screenshots, diagrams, or links that help reviewers understand the PR.

If applicable, include notes for release:
